question_description: Which cities have the highest concentration of medical facilities with valid business registrations?
What is the most common diagnosis code category and its corresponding description among all the bills?
Which business roles have been created or updated the most frequently in the last quarter?
Which businesses have submitted the highest number of invoices in the last quarter?
What is the average zip code length for businesses located in a specific state and how does it vary from the overall average?
Which business registrations had their NSP dashboard status changed to 'offline' between specific dates and who took the action?
